title: BlazBlue: Central Fiction – v1.01
body:
BlazBlue: Central Fiction – v1.01


Genres/Tags: Arcade, Fighting, Side, 2D
Company: Arc System Works
Languages: ENG/MULTI5
Original Size: 28.8 GB
Repack Size: 14.3/14.5 GB

 

Download Mirrors

  • ExtraTorrent /KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on BlazBlue.Centralfiction-CODEX ISO release: codex-blazblue.centralfiction.iso (30,972,018,688 bytes)
  • Patch v1.01 (April 28, 2017) applied over
  • CODEX crack replaced with 3DM one; Alternative crack from REVOLT available in NoDVD folder after installation, allowing multiplayer support via Steam
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of bonus content: OST and artbook
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 28.8 to 14.3/14.5 GB)
  • Installation takes 15-30 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 49 GB
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Combining 2D fighting game and visual novel, the BlazBlue series has been supported by many fighting game fans. The latest installation, BlazBlue: Centralfiction, serves as the ending to the Azure Saga and reveals the truth that has ever been in mystery.
